FuncDef: The reset user-group-queue statistics interface command clears the statistics about a specified GQ in a specified interface.
CLIs: reset user-group-queue statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } pe-vid <pe-vid> ce-vid <ce-vid> { inbound | outbound }
reset user-group-queue statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } vlan <vlan-id> { outbound | inbound }
reset user-group-queue statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } { outbound | inbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies to clear statistics about user group queues on a specified interface or sub-interface.
-

Specifies to clear statistics about user queues in a specified QinQ group.
The value is an integer in the range 1 to 4094.

Specifies to clear statistics about user queues in a specified QinQ group.
The value is an integer in the range 1 to 4094.

Specifies the inbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies the outbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies to clear the statistics about user group queues in a specified VLAN.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 4094.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset user-group-queue statistics interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0.1 pe-vid 1 ce-vid 1 outbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The reset user-group-queue statistics interface command clears the statistics about a specified GQ in a specified interface.
